text: Azerbaijan Technological University () is a public university, specialized in engineering, light industry, and food industry. It is in Ganja, Azerbaijan. It was founded in 1981 by the government of the Azerbaijan Soviet Socialist Republic. The university has 3 faculties and 21 departments. == References == == Related pages == * List of universities in Baku == Other websites == *Official website Category:Technical colleges and universities in Azerbaijan Category:1980s establishments in Azerbaijan Category:1981 establishments in Asia Category:1981 establishments in Europe
title: Azerbaijan Technological University
